==Trivia==
*The Chinese name of the soundtrack may be a reference to a poem{{Lang|zh=春夜月|zh_tl=Moon on a Spring Eve}} by Xu Xuan. It reads:
**{{zh|幽人春望本多情，'''况是花繁月正明。'''<br>竟夕无言亦无寐，绕阶芳草影随行。}}<br>The hermit anticipating springbloom is bound with passion, '''let alone when the flowers are lush and the moon is bright.'''<br>Speechless and sleepless the entire night, the fragrant grass' shadow upon the steps shifts and sways.
